wheelsFX.users.Shapes

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • wheelsFX.users.Shapes.Shape
      • wheelsFX.users.Shapes.Line

  • public class Line
extends Shape
    Line.java: Representation of a JavaFX Line object in WheelsFX

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Line()
      No arguments constructor for a line, the line starts at 0,0 and ends at 50,50
      Line(@NonNull javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Constructor that creates default line size of desired color
      Line(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Constructor to create a line given values for x1, y1, x2, and y2

      Constructor that takes in coordinates of line as well as desired color
      Line(javafx.geometry.Point2D p1, javafx.geometry.Point2D p2)
      Constructor to create a line given two points
